2005.context: DocuSign, Inc. is a electronic signature and agreement cloud company focused on e-signature, contract lifecycle management, and agreement automation. Pioneered electronic signature market. Legal acceptance growing.

2015.context: DocuSign, Inc. is a electronic signature and agreement cloud company focused on e-signature, contract lifecycle management, and agreement automation. Agreement Cloud vision beyond e-signature.

competitors.name: Adobe EchoSign

competitors.name: SignNow

2020.context: DocuSign, Inc. is a electronic signature and agreement cloud company focused on e-signature, contract lifecycle management, and agreement automation. COVID-19 drove massive e-signature adoption. Stock soared.

competitors.name: Adobe Sign
competitors.notes: Major competitor leveraging Adobe Suite integration and brand recognition

competitors.name: HelloSign
competitors.notes: Popular alternative acquired by Dropbox in 2019, known for simplicity

competitors.name: PandaDoc
competitors.notes: Document management platform with e-signature capabilities

competitors.name: SignNow
competitors.notes: Affordable e-signature solution for businesses

competitors.name: OneSpan Sign
competitors.notes: Enterprise e-signature with security focus

2024.context: DocuSign, Inc. is a electronic signature and agreement cloud company focused on e-signature, contract lifecycle management, and agreement automation. Intelligent Agreement Management with AI. Post-pandemic normalization.

competitors.name: Adobe Acrobat Sign
competitors.notes: Adobe Suite partner offering eSignature as secondary service, advanced electronic signatures for PDF documents

competitors.name: PandaDoc
competitors.notes: Best alternative for businesses managing sales documents efficiently, comprehensive document management beyond basic eSignature

competitors.name: OneSpan Sign
competitors.notes: Outranks DocuSign in ease of use, setup, and administration according to G2; rated 94% vs DocuSign's 84% for being a good business partner

competitors.name: Juro
competitors.notes: Top-rated DocuSign competitor, comprehensive contract lifecycle management

competitors.name: Signaturely
competitors.notes: Top DocuSign alternative with simpler interface and competitive pricing

competitors.name: Dropbox Sign
competitors.notes: Formerly HelloSign, integrated with Dropbox ecosystem for seamless document signing

competitors.name: signNow
competitors.notes: Top-5 DocuSign competitor offering affordable eSignature solutions

competitors.name: Zoho Sign
competitors.notes: Strong integration with Zoho CRM, Books, WorkDrive, and Creator ecosystem

competitors.name: DocHub
competitors.notes: Complete platform for document collaboration with team collaboration and editing functionalities

competitors.name: SignRequest
competitors.notes: Simple and straightforward signature solution for teams of every size

competitors.name: Documenso
competitors.notes: Open source DocuSign alternative with enterprise-grade functionality

competitors.name: OpenSign
competitors.notes: Free and open source alternative offering unlimited e-signatures

2025.context: DocuSign, Inc. is a electronic signature and agreement cloud company focused on e-signature, contract lifecycle management, and agreement automation. AI-powered contract analysis. Competing with Adobe Sign, Dropbox.

competitors.name: Adobe Sign
competitors.notes: Part of Adobe Document Cloud, strong integration with Adobe ecosystem

competitors.name: Dropbox Sign (HelloSign)

competitors.name: PandaDoc
